cards.title: Windows 11 readiness data missing, so upgrade blockers may be hidden.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Windows 11 readiness data missing, so upgrade blockers may be hidden.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Generic misconfiguration
steps: Use Evidence to target failing component; review services, logs, and policies.
